actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution electing Representative Hillis of Indiana to the Committee on Armed Services; and Representative Dornan of California to the Committee on Education and Labor.

summary.text: Elects Representative Hillis, of Indiana, to the House Committee on Armed Services, and Representative Dornan, of California, to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

titles.title: A resolution electing Representative Hillis of Indiana to the Committee on Armed Services; and Representative Dornan of California to the Committee on Education and Labor.
